modnlp.tc.dstruct
Class TSReducedText

java.lang.Object
  java.util.AbstractCollection
      java.util.AbstractList
          java.util.Vector
              modnlp.tc.dstruct.TSReducedText
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.Collection, java.util.List, java.util.RandomAccess, java.io.Serializable
public class TSReducedText
extends java.util.Vector

Store NewsItemAsOccurVector's, handle conversions to a variety of formats (just plain strings and ARFF, at the moment, actually) N.B.: TSReducedText is usually BIG! (so use with caution, unless you have lots of memory to spare). In most situations its preferable to work with BVProbabilityModel instead.

See Also:
ARFFUtil, modnlp.tc.classify.BVProbabilityModel, Serialized Form
